name: .RP9 File Extension
summary: Learn about .RP9 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Packaging format used by RetroPlatform, the technology used in the Amiga Forever and C64 Forever emulators; contains one or more disk image files (i.e. .ADF or .D64 files) and a manifest.xml file; compressed as a .ZIP archive, which is renamed to ".rp9."

content: RP9 packages are commonly used for Amiga and Commodore 64 (C64) games. They allow all the media to be contained within a single file, which allows for one-click download and playback.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
